metadata.title: CVE-2022-42254 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernelmode layer (nvidia.ko), where an out-of-bounds array access may lead todenial of service, data tampering, or information disclosure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-42254` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
